channel.title: Elder RSC *Beta*
channel.description:
Hey, we are currently in the beta stage. Once we finally come out of beta all levels you gained while in beta will be kept. We are running the server off a VPS.
Im opening now to try and populate the wilderness of pkers. If you can prove that you are 99hp on another server you can request flat 99s or stats of your choice. You will also recieve a pkers gift package.
Pictures will be added once we come out of beta.
Website: www.project-elder.com Client: http://uppit.com/v/P6PSW4FM
Obviously we are new and we are trying to populate so please keep checking back and checking our beautiful forums.

item.title: Elder RSC *Beta*
item.dc:creator: @yong_min yong min
item.description:
@yong_min wrote:

Everyonedies:

It makes sence, why would you want to get your levels back when you already have had them before? Its a way of getting you pking again quicker.

So why would they waste their time downloading your client, proving they are already 99HP in another server just to come here and PK when they can PK on the server they already have 99HP on?

If you are working like that, i’d just implement a command so players can set their own stats.

Read full topic

item.title: Elder RSC *Beta*
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

Everyonedies:

It makes sence, why would you want to get your levels back when you already have had them before? Its a way of getting you pking again quicker.

Just add a ::flats command and save yourself the trouble…

Read full topic

item.title: Elder RSC *Beta*
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

so you’re saying if you can proove you have 99 hp on another server, youll give them flats on your server…? make no sense…

Read full topic
